resources.string: Please state the contents of the wheel entry
Requires at least two entries to start the wheel.\nPlease go to the Configuration screen to be set.
Quickly toggle wheel with your fingers to start.

This is a fun and useful little software. It can help you to quickly make some decisions, such as: Which restaurant are we going to now? Which film shall we go and see? Whom would you like to go to attend the conference? And ... who should I vote?
How to use:\nFill in the Configuration screen, at least two entries.\nBack to the Wheel screen, Quickly toggle wheel with your fingers to start, Then wait for the result.

The software features:\nSupport the installation to the SD card (Requires at least version 2.2 operating system)\nSupport the voice input (Requires at least version 2.0 operating system and installed Google Voice Search)
Disclaimer: This software is only for entertainment purposes.
